description: Abana bashobora kurohama mu gihe kiri munsi y’iminota ibiri nubwo haba ari mu mazi make ndetse no mu rwogero
title: Abana bashobora kurohama mu gihe kiri munsi y’iminota ibiri nubwo haba ari mu mazi make ndetse no mu rwogero
content:
Abana bashobora kurohama mu gihe kiri munsi y’iminota ibiri nubwo haba ari mu mazi make ndetse no mu rwogero. Ntibagomba na rimwe kuba bari bony-ine mu mazi cyangwa ha yayo.

Kurohama bishobora gutuma ubwonko bugira ikibazo cyangwa bigatera gupfa. Mu gukumira ko abana bagira iki kibazo, ababyeyi ndetse n’abandi bita ku bana bagomba buri gihe gucungira ha abana bari ha y’amazi cyangwa bari mu mazi.
